metadata.title: CVE-2023-3268 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An out of bounds (OOB) memory access flaw was found in the Linux kernel inrelay_file_read_start_pos in kernel/relay.c in the relayfs. This flaw couldallow a local attacker to crash the system or leak kernel internalinformation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3268` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.3.0-7-generic - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-6.3.0-7-generic-lpae - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-generic - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-generic-64k - 6.3.0-7.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.5.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.5.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-gcp - 6.5.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-lowlatency - 6.3.0-7.7.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-lowlatency-64k - 6.3.0-7.7.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-oracle - 6.5.0-1003.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.0-7.7').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1003.3').
linux-azure package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1002.2').
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1002.2').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.0-7.7.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1003.3').
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
